Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades.attributes

Interface SignatureAttribute

All Known Subinterfaces:
CounterSignatureInterface, SigningCertificateInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllDataObjectTimeStamp, ArchiveTimeStamp, AttrAuthoritiesCertValues, AttributeCertificateRefs, AttributeRevocationRefs, AttributeRevocationValues, CertificateValues, CommitmentTypeIndication, CompleteCertificateRefs, CompleteRevocationRefs, ContentTimeStamp, CounterSignature, DataObjectFormat, IndividualDataObjectsTimeStamp, RefsOnlyTimeStamp, RevocationValues, SigAndRefsTimeStamp, SignaturePolicyIdentifier, SignatureProductionPlace, SignatureTimeStamp, SignerRole, SigningCertificate, SigningTime, TimeStamp, TimestampedCertsCRLs, UnsignedDataObjectProperty
public interface SignatureAttribute
Representa um atributo da assinatura.

    Modifier and Type

    Description
    Element

    Retorna o identificador do atributo

    isSigned()
    Informa se o atributo é assinado.
    boolean
    isUnique()
    Verifica se o atributo deve ter apenas uma instância na assinatura

    validate()
    Valida o atributo de acordo com suas regras específicas (ver normas do ETSI para cada atributo).
